InputManager::Attachment Class Reference

#include <InputManager.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The properties of an attachment.

An attachment defines the event that is risen if the object the attached to is triggered.

Definition at line 38 of file InputManager.h.

virtual void Configure (  ConfigSection *  section,
bool  write
)  [virtual]
 

Configures this configurable from a ConfigSection.

Implement this method using the ConfigSection::Configure overloads.

Parameters:
section The ConfigSection to be used.
write Whether to write to the ConfigSection. false reads from it.

const char *  sectionName,
bool  write

Configures the attachment in a subsection of a given ConfigSection, maybe deleting the subsection.

Parameters:
section The parent ConfigSection.
sectionName The subsection name.
write Whether to write to the ConfigSection. false reads from it.
